name: Rodelbahn Rastkogelhütte
description:
Lenght: 4km 
Altitude at start: 2124 m
Altitude at destination: 1650 m 
Altitude difference: 474 m 
Difficulty level: moderate 
Sled hire: Yes 
Cost of using the sled run: free of charge 
Available refreshment points: at the start of the sled run at the Rastkoglehütte (open over the winter from 26th December until approx. Easter) 
Special features: This family-freindly hut offers brethtaking panoramic views over the Zillertal mountains. It is also possible to stay at the hut overnight.
Accessibility:
  How to find: Ascend on the Zillertal Höhenstraße at Hippach until the Sportalm (car park available). 
  Ascent:  The start ofthe sled run is accessible on foot. 90 min 
  Help with your ascent: none
